loka kusalana thunak sandaha ostreliyanu kandayame jathika puhunukaru lesa katayuthu kala jon biyukanan nawasilanthaye nawa krikat adhyakshawaraya lesa pathwa siti.nawasilantha pile puhunukarya pilibanda salasum sahagatha kriyawaliyak athi karamin kridakayange kusalatha hadunaganimin therim kamituwe katayuthu nisiyakarawa kirime bharadura karyaya ohuta pawari athi bawa nawasilantha pradhana krikat widhayaka jastin wogan pawasiya.ohuge pathwimath samaga nawasilantha krikat kridawe nawa pibidimak siduwanu athayi da nawasilantha krikat kandayama wishishtathwayata pathkirime suwishesha hakiyawak da krikat pilibanda shreshta ithihasayak athi biyukanan sathuwana bawa wogan mahatha wadi duratath pawasiya. 1999- 2007 dakwa ostreliyanu puhunukaru wu kwinslantha jathika 58 hawiridi biyukanan ge kalaya thula oste්raliyanu pila loka kusalana 3k jayagath athara test tharaga 16 pita pita jayagrahanaya karana ladi.
